column2: an A.M. Eatery////as for the BLANDNESS ... i don't have a diplomatic way of saying it but at this price point
column3: if your cooks don't know how to season food while cooking
column4: those kinds of hiring decisions are going to catch up with you.  this area of houston is a world-class market
column5: you're swimming with sharks.  barbacoa was dry
column6: eggs were clearly not poached in salt water
column7: and try thickening the hollandaise a bit to concentrate it's flavor.
